conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to an isometric clay-style 3D render.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness, proper corner geometry, and well-handled cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity; room adjacencies and wall positions mostly align. Minor variations in wall length/proportions near foyer/utility areas.

interior_elements.notes: Most furniture (beds, sofa, dining table, kitchen stove) is correctly placed. Some bathroom fixtures are simplified or missing.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Deductions for simplified door/window representations compared to the technical detail in the 2D plan.

detected_errors.description: Window and door placements are simplified; some balcony transitions lack the threshold detail of the 2D plan.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that faithfully maintains the room configuration and furniture layout of the floor plan.
